page.title: 20Hutton People-Two Interviews
page.content: { A Policeman.}Our local police station was closed in 1968 and re-opened in 1981.it is now manned two hours daily. All 999 calls go through to head office in Chelmsford.I am a community policeman with 80% of policing done on foot.I enjoy being in Hutton,there is a variety of work as the area takes in residential,rural and industrial premises.Over the last 3 months there were 104 thefts,39 burglaries and 29 crimes of criminal damage.Glue sniffing and drugs are not a problem. {Director of an engineering firm.}This industry is 23 years old and we have been in Hutton for 20 of them. We employ 60 people in manufacturing parts for Ford Tractors and anything else connected with machine shop engineering.We deliver nationwide with one lorry and export to Brazil and Australia for example.
